caption.p: Overview of the lipid metabolism pathway for Yarrowia lipolytica. DHAP: dihydroxyacetone phosphate; G3P: glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate; DAG: diacylglycerol; PL: phospholipid; TAG: triacylglycerol; FFA: free fatty acids; LA: Linoleic acid; CLA: conjugated linoleic acid; GPD1: NAD +-dependent glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase; GUT1: glycerol kinase; GUT2: glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase; DGA1: diacylglycerol transferase; MA12D: Mortierella alpine Î”12 desaturase; PAI: Propionibacterium acnes isomerase.
